testcase.classname: Add product to cart on Flipkart
testcase.name: Add a product to cart after searching
testcase.system-out: Given User is on flipkart home page.........................................passed When User searchs for "mixer grinder bajaj".................................passed And User select the first product from the search result....................passed And User adding the product to the cart.....................................passed And Product should successfully added to the cart...........................passed Then Display Number of Products in Cart.....................................passed
